phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Time has passed, and the title
of the Wizard King has been passed down through generations.
The Wizard King commands the Magic Knights, and they protect the kingdom together.
The Magic Knights are comprised of nine squads of mages
that specialize in combat, all under the command of the Wizard King.
This band of heroes protects the kingdom with their lives.
To become the Wizard King or a Magic Knight is the aspiration of all in the Clover Kingdom.
To the Royal Capital of the Clover Kingdom!
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
Now to down some moguro leaf juice!
I am going to keep climbing up, even if I do not have any magical powers!
I am sure Yuno's been training, too!
Asta was training for the Magic Knights Entrance Exam,
which was to be held in the royal capital of the Clover Kingdom in six months.
I should wrap up for today.
No, just a little bit more.
I am sure he is also...
Each one's goal was to one day become the Wizard King.
One thousand, five hundred and... three!
But are you really considering allowing Asta to take the exam, too?
Well, he is saying he wants to do it.
And the ones I was counting on...
If someone who was kicked out of the Magic Knights was that strong...
Again, I believe Yuno will be fine, but I do not think Asta's up for it.
Well, he is saying he wants to do it.
Again, I believe Yuno will be fine, but it will be pointless for Asta to take them.
Well, he is saying he wants to do it.
Actually, the idea of Asta going to the royal capital just makes you feel lonely, does not it?
I just believe that if he is going to fail anyway,
he is better off not taking it in the first place.
The little ones will miss him, too.
But they will have one less person to play with!
Why are you looking at me like that?
Well, I will feel a little lonely with both Yuno and Asta gone, Father.
Well, of course, I raised them, and I have lived with them ever since they were babies.
I would be lying if I said I was not a bit sad to see them go.
If possible, I would like for them to stay at the church.
But I also want to let them do what they want to do.
and Asta might fail the exam and come right back anyway.
Yuno will be fine, but the other one will come right back.
How was he able to obtain a grimoire?
I do not even know how, but I was able to get one!
Training's not over until I am back at the church!
Yuno was just a tiny bit faster.
Then I will race you into the church!
Yuno can be pretty childish sometimes.
Yeah, I mean, getting so worked up over Asta, of all people?
How many years will this last us?
I am going to become the Wizard King.
Did you come to watch me train?
I just came by to make fun of the idiot doing something idiotic.
You cannot even use magic, and you are going to take the Magic Knights Entrance Exam?
Of course you are going to fail!
I am going to get into the Magic Knights!
And then, one day, I will become the Wizard Ki
That is never going to happen!
Orphans like us, who are poor... are not allowed to dream like that.
You cannot give up right from the get-go!
I am going to keep chasing my dream!
It does not matter if you are poor or an orphan.
Anyone in this world can become amazing.
They can make their dreams come true.
And I will prove that to you!
I am going to join the Magic Knights
Tomorrow's the day Asta and Yuno set out for the royal capital.
We have to send them off with a bang!
Father went to all the surrounding villages asking for tatoes.
This is not just for you!
Actually, it is mostly for Yuno.
Yuno might make it into the Magic Knights, but you are...
Asta, there is no need to be embarrassed, even if you fail the exam.
No one believes you are going to pass, anyway.
Are you trying to encourage me or make fun of me?!
You can come back at any time.
No matter how crappy or poor it may be, it is your home.
I will be lonely without Asta here.
Y-You should say that to Yuno, too.
Tell him he can come back whenever he wants.
Besides, I will be fine, too!
I am going to become the Wizard King!
And then... I am going to come back for Sister!
So when that happens, marry m
We have stewed tatoes, tato tempura, grilled tatoes,
fried tatoes, stir-fried tatoes, steamed tatoes,
Hage-style boiled tatoes, tato juice, and even special tato pudding!
Do not eat it all yourself, Asta!
If, just if, and it is a very huge if...
If you get into the Magic Knights...
I will believe I can become anything.
And then one day, I will get into the Magic Knights, too.
I will be waiting for you.
Just because we are rivals does not mean we cannot get along!
You have both grown so much.
Asta's always been full of energy.
She will be working here starting today.
All of you, be kind to her.
It might be because of Asta...
Asta and Yuno start their journey to the royal capital in order to take
The royal capital is a long, long way from Hage Village.
I wonder what it is like.
I wonder if we will get to meet the Wizard King!
First, we need to pass the Magic Knights entrance exam.
The royal capital's super far away!
I have got to hurry up and become the Wizard King!
Just because you get there quickly
does not mean you will become the Wizard King any quicker.
I am going to become the Wizard King, and...
My, Asta, you look so impressive.
I came for you, just as I promised.
I have become the Wizard King.
Can you even ride a broom when you do not have any magic?
I can do anything as long as I do not give up!
I am going to leave you behind, Yuno!
Let us train all the way to the royal capital!
Cannot keep up, can you, Yuno?
We have got a long way to go.
I wish everyone back at the church could eat this, too.
I just gave you a hand.
So that is the royal capital.
That is where the Wizard King is.
I am going to do this!
I am going to become the Wizard King!
After a long and perilous journey,
Asta and Yuno arrive at the royal capital of the Clover Kingdom.
The Magic Knights Entrance Exam awaits.
They will now have to compete with many powerful opponents and pass the exam!
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
A grimoire's size and thickness are determined by its owner's style.
You scared you are going to lose?
You are getting a big head just because you are a little handsome, are not you?
The Magic Knights we admire so much are here!
Our path to making our dream of becoming the Wizard King come true starts here!
Black Clover, Page 4: The Magic Knights Entrance Exam!
Page 4 The Magic Knights Entrance Exam
Not giving up is my magic!
